resources.string: All Images from Wikimedia commons\nDice Roll logic from Zybooks
You may bank the current score you have, and pass your turn to your opponent. If you roll a 1 then you lose your current bank score and must pass to your opponent
On your turn you have the opportunity to roll the dice. Any number that isn\'t a 1 is added to your running bank total
First, you will be prompted to set the winning value for the game
The objective of pig dice is to reach the top score first
